_sText:
The original map that this was based on was called: gg_andres_simpsons_dbl_shotty, basically it was never released on the internet and was just made for and used on a popular gungame server called andres funservers in the UK. Unfortunately the server closed down about a year ago and the map was almost lost forever except for 1 or 2 other servers that put the map on.

Everyone seems to love this map, and it's original creator was Aaron Moore. I have retextured it using phqnix's textures and edited a few small things as well as optimized it, and now it's once again available again for everyone to enjoy!

EDIT - This is a new version - I have changed a few things since "gg_dbl_shotty_reloaded" including:

Adding the side bits
Making the top part wider
Moving the boxes near the stairs (they were in the wrong place in the last version)
Using a more appropriate skybox

I think this version looks better than the previous version, mainly thanks to Karatekäfer's skybox.
This version has been renamed to "gg_double_shotty"

Maximum players: 40
Recommended players: 20 - 30

Credits:

Aaron Moore - the original creator of this map - respect <3
Phqnix and Hamster - thanks for the great textures!
Karatekäfer - thanks for the great skybox!

Enjoy, elliotuk and the gg Nuts team!
